prop.caption: src
prop.description: the data instruction on how to load data from the data source into this model.

prop.caption: submission
prop.description: the data instruction on how to record the data from the data source from this model.

prop.caption: session
prop.description: the data instruction on how to store the session data from this model.

prop.caption: autoinit
prop.description: whether to initialize the model immediately. If set to false you are expected to call init() when needed. This is useful when the system has to log in first.

prop.caption: save-original
prop.description: whether to save the original state of the data. This enables the use of the reset() call.

prop.caption: remote
prop.description: the id of the {@link element.remote} element to use for data synchronization between multiple clients.

prop.caption: beforeretrieve
prop.description: Fires before a request is made to retrieve data.

prop.caption: afterretrieve
prop.description: Fires when the request to retrieve data returns both on success and failure.

prop.caption: receive
prop.description: Fires when data is successfully retrieved

prop.caption: beforeload
prop.description: Fires before data is loaded into the model.

prop.caption: afterload
prop.description: Fires after data is loaded into the model.

prop.caption: submiterror
prop.description: Fires when submitting data has failed.

prop.caption: submitsuccess
prop.description: Fires when submitting data was successfull.

prop.caption: error
prop.description: Fires when a communication error has occured while making a request for this element.
